entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
